On March 26, 2023, in Shenzhen Longgang Bantian, the developer violated the plan and cut more than half of the original 100% commercial housing into group rental housing, causing the total number of households in the community to double, triggering the owners' rights protection

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submission
Shanguige, the author of the song "Sunny and Cheerful Kong Yiji" which went viral two days ago, responded on Zhihu after being blocked by Bilibili
In the article, he said that he had been unemployed for a long time, his mother was hospitalized, he owed foreign debts, and he tried to deliver food but scratched someone else's car.
At this time, he saw the official media criticizing young people for being unwilling to take off their long gowns and down-to-earth like Kong Yiji, so he wrote this song to express his feelings.
On Bilibili, 4 million views can only earn 3,000 yuan, and now even the last way to make money has been blocked.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A few days ago, CCTV released a post titled "A post-95s couple set up stalls at night markets and earned 9,000 yuan a day", which sparked widespread discussion among netizens, who asked relevant departments to conduct tax checks
Today, the person involved came out to refute the rumor and became a hot topic, saying that earning 9,000 yuan a day was just an accident, and that their normal turnover was around 6,000 to 7,000 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Finally, according to relevant laws, regulations and policies, the topic of "Kong Yiji" was banned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Another version of the story on the Internet said that the girl did not enter the bathroom at the time, but just joked that she went in wearing a wig.
So the teacher asked the boys not to spread rumors about being recorded.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: While the incident became a hot topic and triggered a lot of public opinion, an even more outrageous follow-up was that the school responded that there were no bathrooms on campus.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Xuhui Education issued a situation report, saying that the incident was untrue, the girl did not enter the men's bathroom, but it was a misunderstanding caused by a joke, and the audio circulating on the Internet had been edited and was misleading.
